ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can fava beans, drained and rinsed
des: "A Mediterranean-style dip that is made from fava beans instead of chickpeas. It has a smooth, delicious flavor that will turn any bean dip lover into an instant fan. Can be used as a dip for pita bread, spelt chips, vegetables, or as a sandwich spread."
ins: Blend fava beans, olive oil, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, shoyu, brown rice vinegar, ginger juice, and chile oil in a blender on medium speed until smooth, about 5 minutes.
